mapper.select:
SELECT CBNO,memNo,id, nickname, companyName, ctitle, content, cnstType, space, area, cost, period, thumbsUp, regDate, modDate FROM (SELECT CBNO,memNo,id, nickname, companyName, ctitle, content, cnstType, space, area, cost, period, thumbsUp, regDate, modDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CBNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM CBOARD WHERE 1=1
) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY CBNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(CBNO) FROM CBOARD WHERE 1=1
AND CBNO > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CBOARD (CBNO, ctitle, space, cnstType, area, cost, period, content, memNo, companyName, address, phoneNum, email) VALUES(cbno_seq.nextval, #{ctitle}, #{space}, #{cnstType}, #{area}, #{cost}, #{period}, #{content}, #{memNo}, #{companyName}, #{address}, #{phoneNum}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT CBNO , CTITLE , CNSTTYPE , SPACE , AREA , COST , PERIOD , CONTENT , REGDATE , MEMNO , COMPANYNAME , ADDRESS , PHONENUM , EMAIL FROM CBOARD WHERE CBNO = #{cbno}
mapper.update: UPDATE CBOARD SET CTITLE = #{ctitle}, SPACE = #{space}, CNSTTYPE = #{cnstType}, AREA = #{area}, COST = #{cost}, PERIOD = #{period}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE CBNO = #{cbno}
mapper.select: select count(CBNO) from CBOARD where CBNO > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cb_attach (fullname, cbno) VALUES (#{fullName}, cbno_seq.currval)
mapper.select: select fullname from cb_attach where cbno = #{cbno} order by regdate
